verses.verse: Συνίστημι <WG4921> Synistēmi I commend ( Personal Greetings and Love) δὲ <WG1161> de - ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you Φοίβην <WG5402> Phoibēn Phoebe , τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἀδελφὴν <WG79> adelphēn sister ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our οὖσαν <WG1510> ousan - ‹καὶ› <WG2532> kai - διάκονον <WG1249> diakonon a servant ( Or deaconess) τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias church τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἐν <WG1722> en in Κενχρεαῖς <WG2747> Kenchreais Cenchrea .

ἵνα <WG2443> hina - αὐτὴν <WG846> autēn her προσδέξησθε <WG4327> prosdexēsthe Welcome ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord ἀξίως <WG516> axiōs in a manner worthy τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἁγίων <WG40> hagiōn of [the] saints , καὶ <WG2532> kai and παραστῆτε <WG3936> parastēte assist αὐτῇ <WG846> autē her ἐν <WG1722> en with ᾧ <WG3739> hō anything ἂν <WG302> an . . . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn from you . χρῄζῃ <WG5535> chrēzē she may need πράγματι <WG4229> pragmati . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai - γὰρ <WG1063> gar For αὐτὴ <WG846> autē she προστάτις <WG4368> prostatis a great help πολλῶν <WG4183> pollōn to many [people] , ἐγενήθη <WG1096> egenēthē has been καὶ <WG2532> kai including ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou me αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou . . . .

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Πρίσκαν <WG4251> Priskan Prisca ( Prisca is a variant of Priscilla; see .) καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἀκύλαν <WG207> Akylan Aquila , τοὺς <WG3588> tous - συνεργούς <WG4904> synergous fellow workers μου <WG1473> mou my ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus ,

οἵτινες <WG3748> hoitines who ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for τῆς <WG3588> tēs . . . ψυχῆς <WG5590> psychēs . . . . μου <WG1473> mou me τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἑαυτῶν <WG1438> heautōn their τράχηλον <WG5137> trachēlon [lives] ὑπέθηκαν <WG5294> hypethēkan have risked οἷς <WG3739> hois - οὐκ <WG3756> ouk Not ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I μόνος <WG3441> monos only εὐχαριστῶ <WG2168> eucharistō are grateful [to them] . ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but καὶ <WG2532> kai - πᾶσαι <WG3956> pasai all αἱ <WG3588> hai the ἐκκλησίαι <WG1577> ekklēsiai churches τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the ἐθνῶν <WG1484> ethnōn Gentiles

καὶ <WG2532> kai [Greet also] τὴν <WG3588> tēn the κατ’ <WG2596> kat’ [that meets] at οἶκον <WG3624> oikon house . αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their ἐκκλησίαν <WG1577> ekklēsian church Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ἐπαίνετον <WG1866> Epaineton Epenetus , τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἀγαπητόν <WG27> agapēton beloved μου <WG1473> mou my ὅς <WG3739> hos who ἐστιν <WG1510> estin was ἀπαρχὴ <WG536> aparchē the first [convert] τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Ἀσίας <WG773> Asias in [the province of] Asia . ( Literally in Asia; Asia was a Roman province in what is now western Turkey.) εἰς <WG1519> eis to Χριστόν <WG5547> Christon Christ

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Μαριάν <WG3137> Marian Mary , ἥτις <WG3748> hētis who πολλὰ <WG4183> polla very hard ἐκοπίασεν <WG2872> ekopiasen has worked εἰς <WG1519> eis for ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you .

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ἀνδρόνικον <WG408> Andronikon Andronicus καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἰουνίαν <WG2458> Iounian Junia , ( Some translators Junias) τοὺς <WG3588> tous - συγγενεῖς <WG4773> syngeneis fellow countrymen μου <WG1473> mou my καὶ <WG2532> kai and συναιχμαλώτους <WG4869> synaichmalōtous fellow prisoners . μου <WG1473> mou - οἵτινές <WG3748> hoitines [They] εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are ἐπίσημοι <WG1978> episēmoi outstanding ἐν <WG1722> en among τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ἀποστόλοις <WG652> apostolois apostles , οἳ <WG3739> hoi [they] καὶ <WG2532> kai and πρὸ <WG4253> pro before ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou I [was] . γέγοναν <WG1096> gegonan were ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ
Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ἀμπλιᾶτον <WG291> Ampliaton Ampliatus , τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἀγαπητόν <WG27> agapēton beloved μου <WG1473> mou my ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord .

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Οὐρβανὸν <WG3773> Ourbanon Urbanus , τὸν <WG3588> ton - συνεργὸν <WG4904> synergon fellow worker ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Στάχυν <WG4720> Stachyn Stachys . τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἀγαπητόν <WG27> agapēton beloved μου <WG1473> mou my

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ἀπελλῆν <WG559> Apellēn Apelles , τὸν <WG3588> ton who [is] δόκιμον <WG1384> dokimon approved ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ . Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who ἐκ <WG1537> ek belong to τῶν <WG3588> tōn the [household] Ἀριστοβούλου <WG711> Aristoboulou of Aristobulus .

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ἡρῳδίωνα <WG2267> Hērōdiōna Herodion , τὸν <WG3588> ton - συγγενῆ <WG4773> syngenē fellow countryman . μου <WG1473> mou my Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet τοὺς <WG3588> tous those ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῶν <WG3588> tōn the [household] Ναρκίσσου <WG3488> Narkissou of Narcissus τοὺς <WG3588> tous who ὄντας <WG1510> ontas are ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord .

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Τρύφαιναν <WG5170> Tryphainan Tryphena καὶ <WG2532> kai and Τρυφῶσαν <WG5173> Tryphōsan Tryphosa , τὰς <WG3588> tas [ women ] who κοπιώσας <WG2872> kopiōsas have worked hard ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord . Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Περσίδα <WG4069> Persida Persis , τὴν <WG3588> tēn [my] ἀγαπητήν <WG27> agapētēn beloved ἥτις <WG3748> hētis who πολλὰ <WG4183> polla very hard ἐκοπίασεν <WG2872> ekopiasen has worked ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord .

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ῥοῦφον <WG4504> Rhouphon Rufus , τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἐκλεκτὸν <WG1588> eklekton chosen ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn - μητέρα <WG3384> mētera mother , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . ἐμοῦ <WG1473> emou [who has been a mother] to me

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Ἀσύνκριτον <WG799> Asynkriton Asyncritus , Φλέγοντα <WG5393> Phlegonta Phlegon , Ἑρμῆν <WG2060> Hermēn Hermes , Πατρόβαν <WG3969> Patroban Patrobas , Ἑρμᾶν <WG2057> Herman Hermas , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοὺς <WG3588> tous the σὺν <WG4862> syn with αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them . ἀδελφούς <WG80> adelphous brothers

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet Φιλόλογον <WG5378> Philologon Philologus καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἰουλίαν <WG2456> Ioulian Julia , Νηρέα <WG3517> Nērea Nereus καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἀδελφὴν <WG79> adelphēn sister , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ὀλυμπᾶν <WG3652> Olympan Olympas καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοὺς <WG3588> tous the σὺν <WG4862> syn with αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them . πάντας <WG3956> pantas all ἁγίους <WG40> hagious saints

Ἀσπάσασθε <WG782> Aspasasthe Greet ἀλλήλους <WG240> allēlous one another ἐν <WG1722> en with φιλήματι <WG5370> philēmati kiss . ἁγίῳ <WG40> hagiō a holy Ἀσπάζονται <WG782> Aspazontai send you greetings ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas . . . . αἱ <WG3588> hai the ἐκκλησίαι <WG1577> ekklēsiai churches πᾶσαι <WG3956> pasai All τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ

Παρακαλῶ <WG3870> Parakalō I urge ( Avoid Divisions) δὲ <WG1161> de Now ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you , ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , σκοπεῖν <WG4648> skopein to watch out for τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who τὰς <WG3588> tas - διχοστασίας <WG1370> dichostasias divisions καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta - σκάνδαλα <WG4625> skandala obstacles [that are] παρὰ <WG3844> para contrary to τὴν <WG3588> tēn the διδαχὴν <WG1322> didachēn teaching ἣν <WG3739> hēn - ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ἐμάθετε <WG3129> emathete have learned . ποιοῦντας <WG4160> poiountas create καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐκκλίνετε <WG1578> ekklinete Turn away ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ from αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them .

οἱ <WG3588> hoi - γὰρ <WG1063> gar For τοιοῦτοι <WG5108> toioutoi such people τῷ <WG3588> tō - Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ , οὐ <WG3756> ou are not δουλεύουσιν <WG1398> douleuousin serving ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but τῇ <WG3588> tē [own] ἑαυτῶν <WG1438> heautōn their κοιλίᾳ <WG2836> koilia appetites . καὶ <WG2532> kai - διὰ <WG1223> dia By τῆς <WG3588> tēs - χρηστολογίας <WG5542> chrēstologias smooth talk καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐλογίας <WG2129> eulogias flattery ἐξαπατῶσιν <WG1818> exapatōsin they deceive τὰς <WG3588> tas the καρδίας <WG2588> kardias hearts τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the ἀκάκων <WG172> akakōn naive .

Ἡ <WG3588> Hē - γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn about your ὑπακοὴ <WG5218> hypakoē obedience , εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv πάντας <WG3956> pantas Everyone ἀφίκετο <WG864> aphiketo [has heard] ἐφ’ <WG1909> eph’ over ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . οὖν <WG3767> oun so χαίρω <WG5463> chairō I rejoice θέλω <WG2309> thelō I want δὲ <WG1161> de But ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you σοφοὺς <WG4680> sophous wise εἶναι <WG1510> einai to be εἰς <WG1519> eis about τὸ <WG3588> to what [is] ἀγαθόν <WG18> agathon good ἀκεραίους <WG185> akeraious innocent δὲ <WG1161> de and εἰς <WG1519> eis about τὸ <WG3588> to what [is] κακόν <WG2556> kakon evil .

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho The δὲ <WG1161> de vvv Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God τῆς <WG3588> tēs - εἰρήνης <WG1515> eirēnēs of peace συντρίψει <WG4937> syntripsei will soon crush τὸν <WG3588> ton - Σατανᾶν <WG4567> Satanan Satan ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo under τοὺς <WG3588> tous - πόδας <WG4228> podas feet . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἐν <WG1722> en vvv τάχει <WG5034> tachei vvv Ἡ <WG3588> HĒ The χάρις <WG5485> charis grace τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus ‹Χριστοῦ› <WG5547> Christou Christ ( NA, NE, and WH Lord Jesus) μεθ’ <WG3326> meth’ [be] with ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you .

Ἀσπάζεται <WG782> Aspazetai sends you greetings ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas . . . , ( Greetings from Paul’s Fellow Workers) Τιμόθεος <WG5095> Timotheos Timothy , ὁ <WG3588> ho - συνεργός <WG4904> synergos fellow worker , μου <WG1473> mou my καὶ <WG2532> kai as do Λούκιος <WG3066> Loukios Lucius , καὶ <WG2532> kai - Ἰάσων <WG2394> Iasōn Jason , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Σωσίπατρος <WG4989> Sōsipatros Sosipater , οἱ <WG3588> hoi - συγγενεῖς <WG4773> syngeneis fellow countrymen . μου <WG1473> mou my

Ἀσπάζομαι <WG782> Aspazomai greet ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I , Τέρτιος <WG5060> Tertios Tertius , ὁ <WG3588> ho who γράψας <WG1125> grapsas wrote down τὴν <WG3588> tēn this ἐπιστολὴν <WG1992> epistolēn letter , ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord .

Ἀσπάζεται <WG782> Aspazetai sends you greetings ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas . . . . Γάϊος <WG1050> Gaios Gaius , ὁ <WG3588> ho who ξένος <WG3581> xenos has hosted μου <WG1473> mou me καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὅλης <WG3650> holēs all τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ἐκκλησίας <WG1577> ekklēsias church , Ἀσπάζεται <WG782> Aspazetai sends you greetings ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas . . . , Ἔραστος <WG2037> Erastos Erastus , ὁ <WG3588> ho the οἰκονόμος <WG3623> oikonomos treasurer , τῆς <WG3588> tēs - πόλεως <WG4172> poleōs city καὶ <WG2532> kai [as does] Κούαρτος <WG2890> Kouartos Quartus . ( SBL, BYZ, and TR include 24May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.) ὁ <WG3588> ho [our] ἀδελφός <WG80> adelphos brother

Τῷ <WG3588> Tō to Him who ( Doxology) δὲ <WG1161> de Now δυναμένῳ <WG1410> dynamenō is able ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you στηρίξαι <WG4741> stērixai to strengthen κατὰ <WG2596> kata by τὸ <WG3588> to - εὐαγγέλιόν <WG2098> euangelion gospel μου <WG1473> mou my καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸ <WG3588> to by the κήρυγμα <WG2782> kērygma proclamation Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou of Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ , κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to ἀποκάλυψιν <WG602> apokalypsin [the] revelation μυστηρίου <WG3466> mystēriou of [the] mystery χρόνοις <WG5550> chronois vvv αἰωνίοις <WG166> aiōniois for ages past σεσιγημένου <WG4601> sesigēmenou concealed

φανερωθέντος <WG5319> phanerōthentos revealed δὲ <WG1161> de but νῦν <WG3568> nyn now διά <WG1223> dia vvv τε <WG5037> te through γραφῶν <WG1124> graphōn the writings προφητικῶν <WG4397> prophētikōn of the prophets κατ’ <WG2596> kat’ by ἐπιταγὴν <WG2003> epitagēn [the] command τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the αἰωνίου <WG166> aiōniou eternal Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God , εἰς <WG1519> eis to the ὑπακοὴν <WG5218> hypakoēn obedience πίστεως <WG4102> pisteōs [that comes from] faith — ( Literally the obedience of faith) εἰς <WG1519> eis in order to lead πάντα <WG3956> panta all τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔθνη <WG1484> ethnē nations γνωρισθέντος <WG1107> gnōristhentos [and] made known

μόνῳ <WG3441> monō [to the] only σοφῷ <WG4680> sophō wise Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God διὰ <WG1223> dia through Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ ! ᾧ <WG3739> hō - ἡ <WG3588> hē [be] δόξα <WG1391> doxa glory εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv αἰῶνας <WG165> aiōnas forever 〈τῶν <WG3588> tōn . . . αἰώνων〉 <WG165> aiōnōn . . . ἀμήν <WG281> amēn Amen . ( Some manuscripts place the text of verses 25–27 after or after .)
